TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NUnit2XmlOutputWriter extends NUnitLite.Runner.OutputWriter

Docs.summary: NUnit2XmlOutputWriter is able to create an xml file representing the result of a test run in NUnit 2.x format.
